text: :For information about the Gothic metal band, see Sirenia (band) Sirenia is an order of herbivorous mammals. In this order are the dugong and three species of manatee. == Taxonomy == * Order Sirenia ** Family Dugongidae *** Dugong, Dugong dugon *** â€ Steller's sea cow, Hydrodamlis gigas ** Family Trichechidae *** West Indian manatee, Trichechus manatus *** African manatee, Trichechus senegalensis *** Amazonian manatee, Trichechus inunguis ==References== ==Other websites==
title: Sirenia
